alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Washington; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 26 at 5:06AM EST until January 26 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Massachusetts and Rhode Island, including the following areas, in Massachusetts, Bristol, Norfolk, Plymouth, Southeast Middlesex, and Suffolk Counties. In Rhode Island, Bristol, Kent, Providence, Newport and Washington Counties. * WHEN...Until Noon EST today. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Rainfall will diminish in intensity and move off to the east this morning. Small rivers, streams and creeks will continue to rise due to rainfall which has already fallen, and the additional rainfall this morning. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Washington; Western Kent
